privacy_policy: REQUIRED. This is your privacy policy, 2000 characters maximum. Generate a privacy policy here: https://privacychoice.org/policymaker
price: REQUIRED. Your price tier. e.g. free, tier_1, tier_3. See README.md for more info
availability: REQUIRED. Your app availability goes here. Example: global. Example 2: mexico, argentina, spain. See README.md for more info

in_app - OPTIONAL. Erase section if unne.payment: Is in-app payment available or not? The value should either be true or false

product_name.name: Name of first in-app product, 50 characters maximum
product_name.price: Your price tier. e.g. free, tier_1, tier_3. See README.md for more info

product_name.name: Name of second in-app product, 50 characters maximum
product_name.price: Your price tier. e.g. free, tier_1, tier_3. See README.md for more info

in_app - OPTIONAL. Erase section if unne: payment - OPTIONAL. Erase section if unnecessary

bango.username: Get a username by registering for an account here: http://bango.com/
bango.token: Token will be given after completing registration
